Text: Ur great Pooloop, thanks for posting all these footie vids.  I live in Korea, so it's hard to watch everything live.  Appreciate the great efforts
Also appreciate your efforts in our expat community exiled out here in the Middle East

Thanks pooloop, you're a star, a shining beacon of generosity and love in the filthy quagmire of greed, corruption and porn that the internet has become. Of course, I quite like a bit of greedy porn but above all else I appreciate the footie so big respect mate.

I really can't praise these enough.  Always on time, always great quality.

If only everyone else posted like this!

Also, lol @ george1880 - well worded my son!
Thanks Pooloop! You are the greatest! Newcastle United 4-LIFE
